result.title: Canada Holidays API
result.description: This API lists all 31 public holidays for all 13 provinces and territories in Canada, including federal holidays.

title: Canada Holidays API
description: This API lists all 31 public holidays for all 13 provinces and territories in Canada, including federal holidays.

endpoints.name: holidays
endpoints.description: Returns Canadian public holidays. Each holiday lists the regions that observe it.

federal.description: A boolean parameter. If true or 1, will return only federal holidays. If false or 0, will return no federal holidays.

optional.description: A boolean parameter. If false or 0 (default), will return only legislated holidays. If true or 1, will return optional holidays from Alberta and BC.

endpoints.name: holiday
endpoints.description: Returns one Canadian statutory holiday by integer id. Returns a 404 response for invalid ids.

optional.description: A boolean parameter. If false or 0 (default), will return provinces for which this is a legislated holiday. If true or 1, will return provinces which optionally celebrate this holiday.

endpoints.name: provinces
endpoints.description: Returns provinces and territories in Canada. Each province or territory lists its associated holidays.

optional.description: A boolean parameter. If false or 0 (default), will return only legislated holidays. If true or 1, will return optional holidays from Alberta and BC.

endpoints.name: province
endpoints.description: Returns a Canadian province or territory with its associated holidays. Returns a 404 response for invalid abbreviations.

optional.description: A boolean parameter (AB and BC only). If false or 0 (default), will return only legislated holidays. If true or 1, will return optional holidays from Alberta and BC.

endpoints.name: spec
endpoints.description: Gets the schema for the JSON API as a yaml file.
